thread.title: BRIEF-Onconova Therapeutics Announces Pricing Of $25 Mln Upsized Underwritten Public Offering

title: BRIEF-Onconova Therapeutics Announces Pricing Of $25 Mln Upsized Underwritten Public Offering

organizations.name: mln upsized underwritten public offering reuters

text:
06 AM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Onconova Therapeutics Announces Pricing Of $25 Mln Upsized Underwritten Public Offering Reuters Staff
April 27 (Reuters) - Onconova Therapeutics Inc:
* ONCONOVA THERAPEUTICS ANNOUNCES PRICING OF $25.0 MILLION UPSIZED UNDERWRITTEN PUBLIC OFFERING
* ONCONOVA THERAPEUTICS- PRICED PUBLIC OFFERING OF 58.8 MILLION SHARES OF COMMON STOCK & WARRANTS AT $0.425 PER SHARE & ACCOMPANYING PREFERRED STOCK WARRANT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
